00052 bool gSuppressMessages = false;

00066 // method definitions

00068 MsgHandler*
00069 MsgHandler::getMessageInstance() {
00070     if (myMessageInstance == 0) {
00071         myMessageInstance = new MsgHandler(MT_MESSAGE);
00072     }
00073     return myMessageInstance;
00074 }

00077 MsgHandler*
00078 MsgHandler::getWarningInstance() {
00079     if (myWarningInstance == 0) {
00080         myWarningInstance = new MsgHandler(MT_WARNING);
00081     }
00082     return myWarningInstance;
00083 }

00086 MsgHandler*
00087 MsgHandler::getErrorInstance() {
00088     if (myErrorInstance == 0) {
00089         myErrorInstance = new MsgHandler(MT_ERROR);
00090     }
00091     return myErrorInstance;

00094 
00095 void
00096 MsgHandler::inform(std::string msg, bool addType) {
00097     if (myLock != 0) {
00098         myLock->lock();
00099     }
00100     // beautify progress output
00101     if (myAmProcessingProcess && (myReport2COUT || myReport2CERR)) {
00102         std::cout << std::endl;
00103     }
00104     msg = build(msg, addType);
00105     // report to std::cout if wished
00106     if (myReport2COUT) {
00107         std::cout << msg << std::endl;
00108     }
00109     // report to std::cerr if wished
00110     if (myReport2CERR) {
00111         std::cerr << msg << std::endl;
00112     }
00113     // inform all other receivers
00114     for (RetrieverVector::iterator i = myRetrievers.begin(); i != myRetrievers.end(); i++) {
00115         (*i)->inform(msg);
00116     }
00117     // set the information that something occured
00118     myWasInformed = true;
00119     myAmProcessingProcess = false;
00120     if (myLock != 0) {
00121         myLock->unlock();
00122     }
00123 }
00124 
00125 
00126 void
00127 MsgHandler::progressMsg(std::string msg, bool addType) {
00128     if (myLock != 0) {
00129         myLock->lock();
00130     }
00131     // beautify progress output
00132     if (myAmProcessingProcess && (myReport2COUT || myReport2CERR)) {
00133         std::cout << std::endl;
00134     }
00135     msg = build(msg, addType);
00136     // report to std::cout if wished
00137     if (myReport2COUT) {
00138         std::cout << msg << '\r';
00139     }
00140     // report to std::cerr if wished
00141     if (myReport2CERR) {
00142         std::cerr << msg << '\r';
00143     }
00144     // inform all other receivers
00145     for (RetrieverVector::iterator i = myRetrievers.begin(); i != myRetrievers.end(); i++) {
00146         (*i)->inform(msg);
00147     }
00148     // set the information that something occured
00149     myWasInformed = true;
00150     myAmProcessingProcess = false;
00151     if (myLock != 0) {
00152         myLock->unlock();
00153     }
00154 }

00156 
00157 void
00158 MsgHandler::beginProcessMsg(std::string msg, bool addType) {
00159     if (myLock != 0) {
00160         myLock->lock();
00161     }
00162     msg = build(msg, addType);
00163     // report to std::cout if wished
00164     if (myReport2COUT) {
00165         std::cout << msg << ' ';
00166         std::cout.flush();
00167         myAmProcessingProcess = true;
00168     }
00169     // report to std::cerr if wished
00170     if (myReport2CERR) {
00171         std::cerr << msg << ' ';
00172         std::cerr.flush();
00173         myAmProcessingProcess = true;
00174     }
00175     // inform all other receivers
00176     for (RetrieverVector::iterator i = myRetrievers.begin(); i != myRetrievers.end(); i++) {
00177         (*i)->inform(msg + " ");
00178         myAmProcessingProcess = true;
00179     }
00180     // set the information that something occured
00181     myWasInformed = true;
00182     if (myLock != 0) {
00183         myLock->unlock();
00184     }
00185 }
00186 
00187 
00188 void
00189 MsgHandler::endProcessMsg(std::string msg) {
00190     if (myLock != 0) {
00191         myLock->lock();
00192     }
00193     // report to std::cout if wished
00194     if (myReport2COUT) {
00195         std::cout << msg << std::endl;
00196     }
00197     // report to std::cerr if wished
00198     if (myReport2CERR) {
00199         std::cerr << msg << std::endl;
00200     }
00201     // inform all other receivers
00202     for (RetrieverVector::iterator i = myRetrievers.begin(); i != myRetrievers.end(); i++) {
00203         (*i)->inform(msg);
00204     }
00205     // set the information that something occured
00206     myWasInformed = true;
00207     myAmProcessingProcess = false;
00208     if (myLock != 0) {
00209         myLock->unlock();
00210     }
00211 }

00213 
00214 void
00215 MsgHandler::clear() {
00216     if (myLock != 0) {
00217         myLock->lock();
00218     }
00219     myWasInformed = false;
00220     if (myLock != 0) {
00221         myLock->unlock();
00222     }
00223 }
00224 
00225 
00226 void
00227 MsgHandler::addRetriever(OutputDevice* retriever) {
00228     if (myLock != 0) {
00229         myLock->lock();
00230     }
00231     RetrieverVector::iterator i =
00232         find(myRetrievers.begin(), myRetrievers.end(), retriever);
00233     if (i == myRetrievers.end()) {
00234         myRetrievers.push_back(retriever);
00235     }
00236     // check whether the message shall be generated
00237     if (myType == MT_WARNING) {
00238         gSuppressWarnings = OptionsCont::getOptions().exists("no-warnings")
00239                             ? OptionsCont::getOptions().getBool("no-warnings")
00240                             : false;
00241     } else if (myType == MT_MESSAGE) {
00242         gSuppressMessages = false;
00243     }
00244     if (myLock != 0) {
00245         myLock->unlock();
00246     }
00247 }
00248 
00249 
00250 void
00251 MsgHandler::removeRetriever(OutputDevice* retriever) {
00252     if (myLock != 0) {
00253         myLock->lock();
00254     }
00255     RetrieverVector::iterator i =
00256         find(myRetrievers.begin(), myRetrievers.end(), retriever);
00257     if (i != myRetrievers.end()) {
00258         myRetrievers.erase(i);
00259     }
00260     // check whether the message shall be generated
00261     if (myType == MT_WARNING) {
00262         gSuppressWarnings = OptionsCont::getOptions().exists("no-warnings")
00263                             ? OptionsCont::getOptions().getBool("no-warnings")
00264                             : myRetrievers.size() == 0;
00265     } else if (myType == MT_MESSAGE) {
00266         gSuppressMessages = !(myRetrievers.size() == 0 || myReport2COUT);
00267     }
00268     if (myLock != 0) {
00269         myLock->unlock();
00270     }
00271 }
00272 
00273 
00274 void
00275 MsgHandler::report2cout(bool value) {
00276     if (myLock != 0) {
00277         myLock->lock();
00278     }
00279     myReport2COUT = value;
00280     if (myType == MT_WARNING) {
00281         gSuppressWarnings = OptionsCont::getOptions().exists("no-warnings")
00282                             ? OptionsCont::getOptions().getBool("no-warnings")
00283                             : !myReport2COUT;
00284     } else if (myType == MT_MESSAGE) {
00285         gSuppressMessages = myRetrievers.size() == 0 && !myReport2COUT;
00286     }
00287     std::cout.setf(std::ios::fixed, std::ios::floatfield);
00288     if (myLock != 0) {
00289         myLock->unlock();
00290     }
00291 }
00292 
00293 
00294 void
00295 MsgHandler::report2cerr(bool value) {
00296     if (myLock != 0) {
00297         myLock->lock();
00298     }
00299     myReport2CERR = value;
00300     if (myType == MT_WARNING) {
00301         gSuppressWarnings = OptionsCont::getOptions().exists("no-warnings")
00302                             ? OptionsCont::getOptions().getBool("no-warnings")
00303                             : !myReport2CERR;
00304     } else if (myType == MT_MESSAGE) {
00305         gSuppressMessages = myRetrievers.size() == 0 && !myReport2COUT;
00306     }
00307     std::cerr.setf(std::ios::fixed, std::ios::floatfield);
00308     if (myLock != 0) {
00309         myLock->unlock();
00310     }
00311 }
00312 
00313 
00314 void
00315 MsgHandler::initOutputOptions(bool gui) {
00316     OptionsCont& oc = OptionsCont::getOptions();
00317     getMessageInstance()->report2cout(!gui && oc.getBool("verbose"));
00318     getWarningInstance()->report2cerr(!gui && !oc.getBool("no-warnings"));
00319     // build the logger if possible
00320     if (oc.isSet("log")) {
00321         try {
00322             OutputDevice* logFile = &OutputDevice::getDevice(oc.getString("log"));
00323             getErrorInstance()->addRetriever(logFile);
00324             getWarningInstance()->addRetriever(logFile);
00325             getMessageInstance()->addRetriever(logFile);
00326         } catch (IOError&) {
00327             throw ProcessError("Could not build logging file '" + oc.getString("log") + "'");
00328         }
00329     }
00330     if (oc.isSet("message-log")) {
00331         try {
00332             OutputDevice* logFile = &OutputDevice::getDevice(oc.getString("message-log"));
00333             getMessageInstance()->addRetriever(logFile);
00334         } catch (IOError&) {
00335             throw ProcessError("Could not build logging file '" + oc.getString("message-log") + "'");
00336         }
00337     }
00338     if (oc.isSet("error-log")) {
00339         try {
00340             OutputDevice* logFile = &OutputDevice::getDevice(oc.getString("error-log"));
00341             getErrorInstance()->addRetriever(logFile);
00342             getWarningInstance()->addRetriever(logFile);
00343         } catch (IOError&) {
00344             throw ProcessError("Could not build logging file '" + oc.getString("error-log") + "'");
00345         }
00346     }
00347 }
00348 
00349 
00350 void
00351 MsgHandler::cleanupOnEnd() {
00352     if (myLock != 0) {
00353         myLock->lock();
00354     }
00355     delete myMessageInstance;
00356     myMessageInstance = 0;
00357     delete myWarningInstance;
00358     myWarningInstance = 0;
00359     delete myErrorInstance;
00360     myErrorInstance = 0;
00361     if (myLock != 0) {
00362         myLock->unlock();
00363     }
00364 }
00365 
00366 
00367 MsgHandler::MsgHandler(MsgType type)
00368     : myType(type), myWasInformed(false), myReport2COUT(type == MT_MESSAGE),
00369       myReport2CERR(type != MT_MESSAGE) {}
00370 
00371 
00372 MsgHandler::~MsgHandler() {
00373 }

00375 
00376 bool
00377 MsgHandler::wasInformed() const {
00378     return myWasInformed;
00379 }

00381 
00382 void
00383 MsgHandler::assignLock(AbstractMutex* lock) {
00384     assert(myLock == 0);
00385     myLock = lock ;
00386 }
